```{r Setup, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}


# Functions
quiet <- capture.output({
  usethis::proj_get()
})
suppressWarnings({
  library(knitr)
  library(kableExtra)
  library(dplyr)
  library(VISCtemplates)
})

# Set R chunk options

opts_chunk$set(
  results = "asis",
  cache = FALSE,
  echo = FALSE,
  tidy = TRUE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  dev = c("pdf", "png"),
  dpi = 300,
  fig.pos = 'htbp',
  fig.height = 7,
  fig.width = 7,
  scipen = 0,
  digits = 4,
  eval = FALSE,
  concordance = TRUE
)
```

# Response Rates

## Relative to Baseline

```{r response-rates-base, echo=FALSE, results="asis", eval=TRUE}

mtcars[rep(1:32, 2), 1:5] %>%
  kable(
    format = "latex",
    caption = paste0("Response Rates Compared to Baseline. "),
    align = "lllrr",
    booktabs = TRUE,
    longtable = TRUE,
    linesep = "",
    escape = FALSE
  ) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = 'repeat_header',
                repeat_header_method = 'replace',
                font_size = 10)
```
